css_rules.cssText: body { font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol"; font-size: 100%; color: rgb(26, 26, 26); padding: 0px; margin: 0px; }
.LoadingSpinner { display: block; width: 20px; height: 20px; position: relative; }

.LoadingSpinner::before { content: ""; border-width: 2px; border-style: solid; border-color: currentcolor rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15) rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15); border-image: initial; border-radius: 50%; position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; left: 50%; top: 50%; margin-left: -10px; margin-top: -10px; animation: 0.5s linear 0s infinite normal none running spin; display: block; }

.Button { appearance: none; box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; cursor: pointer; font-size: inherit; padding: 1rem 1.25rem; background: rgb(252, 252, 252); border: none; box-shadow: rgb(230, 230, 230) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; font-weight: 500; border-radius: 4px; transition: background-color 0.2s ease-out 0s, color 0.2s ease-out 0s, box-shadow 0.2s ease-out 0s; position: relative; }
.Button--Primary { background-color: rgb(10, 117, 194); color: rgb(255, 255, 255); box-shadow: none; }
.Button__LoadingSpinner { display: none; width: 20px; height: 20px; position: absolute; left: 50%; top: 50%; margin-left: -10px; margin-top: -10px; }
.Button:disabled,  .Button:disabled:hover,  .Button:disabled:focus,  .Button:disabled:active { background-color: rgb(204, 204, 204); color: rgb(255, 255, 255); cursor: not-allowed; }

.InputField,  .CreditCardInputField { appearance: none; font-size: inherit; border: none; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); box-shadow: rgb(148, 148, 148) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; padding: 1rem 0.5rem; border-radius: 5px; }

.ToggleField__Input { font-size: inherit; width: 18px; height: 18px; cursor: pointer; box-shadow: rgb(148, 148, 148) 0px 0px 0px 1px inset; transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out 0s; border: none; border-radius: 4px; appearance: none; background: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; vertical-align: middle; position: relative; top: -0.1rem; }

.ToggleField__Input--Checkbox { width: 18px; height: 18px; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out 0s; border: none; border-radius: 4px; background: 0px 0px; box-sizing: border-box; vertical-align: middle; padding: initial; margin: 0px 15px 0px 0px; }

.ToggleField__Input--Checkbox::after { content: ""; display: block; position: absolute; width: 18px; height: 18px; top: 0px; left: 0px; background-image: url("https://static.boldcommerce.com/images/checkout/experience/checkbox_white.svg"); background-position: center center; background-repeat: no-repeat; transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out 0.1s; transform: scale(0); }

.Field--WithInputField .Field__Label,  .Field--WithCreditCardField .Field__Label { position: absolute; font-size: 80%; padding-left: 0.5em; padding-top: 0.5em; color: rgb(136, 136, 136); transform: translateY(0.5em); opacity: 0; transition: all 0.2s ease 0s; }
.Field .InputField,  .Field .CreditCardInputField { display: block; width: 100%; transition: all 0.2s ease-out 0s; }
.TogglePanel__Content { display: none; padding: 10px; border-top: 1px solid rgb(230, 230, 230); background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250); }
.TogglePanelGroup { border: 1px solid rgb(148, 148, 148); border-radius: 5px; flex: 0 0 auto; width: 100%; }

.Field--WithInputField .Field__Label { position: absolute; font-size: 80%; padding-left: 0.5em; padding-top: 0.5em; color: rgb(136, 136, 136); transform: translateY(0.5em); opacity: 0; transition: all 0.2s ease 0s; }
.Field .InputField { display: block; width: 100%; transition: all 0.2s ease-out 0s; }

.Message { width: 100%; flex: 0 0 auto; display: block; margin: 1rem 0px; padding: 1rem 0.5rem 1rem 3rem; border-radius: 4px; position: relative; border: 1px solid rgb(217, 217, 217); color: rgb(136, 136, 136); background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250); min-height: 3.25rem; }

.Message::before { width: 1.25rem; height: 1.25rem; content: ""; display: block; position: absolute; left: 1rem; top: 1rem; background-image: url("https://static.boldcommerce.com/images/checkout/experience/message_info_grey.svg"); background-position: center center; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: contain; }
.Message--HasError { background-color: white; border-color: red; color: red; }
.Message--HasWarning { background-color: white; border-color: orange; color: darkorange; }
.Message--HasSuccess { background-color: white; border-color: limegreen; color: green; }
.Field .InputField, .Field .SelectField,  .Field .CreditCardInputField { display: block; width: 100%; transition: all 0.2s ease-out 0s; }

#flexiti-widget { transition: all 0.1s ease-out 0s; position: fixed; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 100%; height: 100%; z-index: 9999999; text-align: center; display: table; opacity: 1; inset: 0px; }

.Action--Dismiss { display: inline-block; width: 1rem; height: 1rem; line-height: 1rem; border-radius: 8px; background-color: rgb(217, 217, 217); color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6); position: relative; cursor: pointer; flex: 0 0 auto; margin-right: 4px; }
.Action--Dismiss::before { content: "×"; height: 1rem; width: 1rem; text-align: center; position: absolute; justify-content: center; padding: 0px; line-height: inherit; }

.PaymentMethod .StoredCard__RemoveAction.Action--Dismiss::before { content: "✕"; background: rgb(116, 118, 121); color: white; width: 18px; display: inline-block; line-height: 1.5em; height: 18px; border-radius: 50%; text-align: center; position: absolute; font-size: 12px; top: -2px; cursor: pointer; }

#PaymentMethodPPCP .TogglePanel__Content #paypal-button-container,  #PaymentMethodPPCP .TogglePanel__Content #venmo-button-container { display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: center; align-items: center; text-align: center; margin: 0px 2px; width: 100%; padding: 15px 0px; }

#overlay { transition: all 0.5s ease-out 0s; position: fixed; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85); color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 100%; height: 100%; z-index: 50; text-align: center; display: table; opacity: 1; inset: 0px; }
#overlay h3 { color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 20px; max-width: 800px; margin: 0px auto; }
